summary: Tested multi-date selection feature for course reservations. All features working correctly: toggle selection (click to add/remove dates), pink border (#D91CD2) and checkmark (✔) on selected dates, dates badges display in price summary, correct price calculation (3 dates × 30 CHF = 90 CHF), offers section visibility only when dates selected, backend reservation with selectedDates array, pink scrollbar (4px), and white shop text (#FFFFFF in code).

issues: YouTube video shows 'Video unavailable' - the configured YouTube URL may be invalid or restricted

passed_tests: CRITICAL: Multi-date toggle selection works - clicking adds date, re-clicking removes it
CRITICAL: Selected dates show pink border (#D91CD2 = rgb(217, 28, 210)) and checkmark ✔
CRITICAL: Price calculation correct - 3 dates × CHF 30.00 = CHF 90.00
CRITICAL: Dates badges displayed in price summary with pink border
CRITICAL: Offers section only visible when at least one date is selected
CRITICAL: Backend accepts selectedDates array and selectedDatesText in reservation
Sessions scrollbar is pink (#D91CD2) and thin (4px)
Shop section text styled as pure white (#FFFFFF) with font-weight 300
All 8 pytest backend tests passed for multi-date selection
critical_code_review_comments: Multi-date selection state: selectedDates = [] (array) at line 2145
Toggle function toggleDateSelection() at line 2161 correctly adds/removes dates
Price calculation at line 2531: multiplier = isPhysicalProduct ? quantity : Math.max(1, selectedDates.length)
Dates badges display at lines 3289-3314 with pink styling
Backend Reservation model has selectedDates: Optional[List[str]] at line 173
Backend ReservationCreate model has selectedDates at line 198
CSS .session-btn.selected has border: 2px solid #d91cd2 at line 246

test_credentials.coach_access: Triple click on '© Afroboost 2026' copyright text at bottom of page

context_for_next_testing_agent: Multi-date selection feature fully implemented and tested. Key behavior: 1) Click date to select (adds to selectedDates array), 2) Click again to deselect (removes from array), 3) Selected dates show pink border + checkmark, 4) Price = offer.price × selectedDates.length, 5) Offers section only appears after selecting at least one date, 6) Single reservation created with selectedDates array. No products in database so shop section not visible, but code styling verified as white (#FFFFFF).
